======
ASGARD
======

*A Sensor Geometry Application Reusable by-Design*

What is it?
-----------

A tool providing sensor geometry modelisation for Sentinel missions. It allows to perform
geolocation and other related tasks on L0/L1 Sentinel products. Different types of sensors are
supported (S2 MSI, S1 SAR, S3 SLSTR, ...).
